passive_1: Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion causes you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion to gain 20% bonus movement speed decaying over 2.5 seconds as well as 50 – 230 (based on user's level) bonus health for 4 seconds (30 second cooldown).

Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion causes you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion to gain 25% bonus movement speed decaying over 3 seconds as well as 50 – 230 (based on user's level) bonus health for 4 seconds (30 second cooldown).

Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion causes you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion to gain 30% bonus movement speed decaying over 3 seconds as well as (7% of your maximum health) bonus health for 4 seconds (20 second cooldown).

Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion causes you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion to gain 90 bonus movement speed decaying over 4 seconds as well as 120 bonus health for 4 seconds (20 second cooldown).
passive_2: Consumes a charge to place a  Stealth Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area. Charges refill upon visiting the shop (4 charges; 600 range).
passive_3: Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
